name: NSF awards in the SEH doctorate population, by employment sector, sex, race, and ethnicity
description: NSF awards in the SEH doctorate population, by employment sector, sex, race, and ethnicity

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_employed_by_4_year_educational_institution_nsf_awardees
variableMeasured.description: Employed By 4 Year Educational Institution Nsf Awardees

variableMeasured.name: field_employed_by_4_year_educational_institution_total
variableMeasured.description: Employed By 4 Year Educational Institution Total

variableMeasured.name: field_employed_by_4_year_educational_institution_share_
variableMeasured.description: Employed By 4 Year Educational Institution Share

notes: Other includes American Indian or Alaska Native, Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander, and multiple race. Hispanic may be any race; Asian, Black, and White exclude Hispanic origin. The 4-year educational institution sector includes 4-year colleges or universities, medical schools (including university-affiliated hospitals or medical centers), and university-affiliated research institutions.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients, 2015, linked to the public NSF Awards Database (https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/download.jsp).
